name: Alex Morataya
coverLetter: Currently majoring in Horticulture for the past 2 years, I am enrolled at Mount SAC this semester for a greenhouse management course - where I have been trimming a range of different plants. I have also gained most of my credits in transferring to Cal Poly Pomona within the next year. Iâ€™ve built my college education around scientifically understanding and practicing horticulture techniques, I am also well versed in plant diseases, medium amendments, genetics (cross breeding), propagation and pruning techniques to name a few. I hope to hear back from you and I appreciate the time and opportunity. Available all October and November 2017
